and <S%G2532><s%> ye have <S%G1585>forgotten<s%> the <S%G3874>exhortation<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1256>reasoneth<s%> with <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> with <S%G5207>sons<s%>, <S%G3450>My<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%>, <S%G3643>regard<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3643>lightly<s%> the <S%G3809>chastening<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G3366>Nor<s%> <S%G1590>faint<s%> when thou art <S%G1651>reproved<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>;

lest <S%G3361>there<s%> be <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G4205>fornicator<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> profane <S%G952>person<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2269>Esau<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G473>for<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> mess of <S%G1035>meat<s%> <S%G591>sold<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> own <S%G4415>birthright<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G2089>word<s%>, Yet <S%G530>once<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%>, <S%G1213>signifieth<s%> the <S%G3331>removing<s%> of those things that are <S%G4531>shaken<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> of things that have been <S%G4160>made<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> those things <S%G4531>which<s%> are <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4531>shaken<s%> may <S%G3306>remain<s%>.
